name: Souls of Bilbao by Jonathan Murillo

metadata.name: First Soul
metadata.description:
"It is through geometry that one purifies the eye of the soul." - Plato

Essay: the purity and perfectness of geometric forms, such as circles, triangles and squares, bring certain balance and beauty to compositions. In this case, the semi-circle acts as both a compositional element and a leading line to the subject.
